name: nodash-dev
description: Nodash development workspace - private servers and infrastructure

scripts.generate-sdk: cd packages/nodash-sdk-generator && npm run build && node dist/cli.js generate --servers ../../packages/servers --public-repo ../../../../nodash
scripts.sync-public: npm run generate-sdk && cd ../nodash && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: sync SDK from server definitions' && git push
